name: RPG-LOOP
description:
This is a game in a post-apocalyptic setting.

The player takes on the role of a character who has traveled back in time after surviving the apocalypse.

Then with the help of memory fragments, find a way to save the disaster.

The game gets into a kind of wonderful loop that requires the player to find the exit.

Start the adventure, Traveler~!

Controls

W - Move Up

S - Move Down

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

R - Talk

Space - Attack with a weapon

Left-Mouse Button - Select Menu
